ideas.title: This week on How I AI: How Zapier’s EA built an army of AI interns
ideas.description: Your weekly listens from How I AI, part of the Lenny's Podcast Network
hooks: AI Interns: Zapier's Secret Productivity Weapon
How One EA Transformed Work with AI
Zapier's Radical AI Workflow Hack Revealed

tips: Use dynamic screen recordings showing actual AI workflow
Create bold, animated chapter markers for easy navigation

visualDirection.description: High-energy motion graphics with tech-inspired color palette (deep blues, electric teals). Dynamic split-screen compositions showcasing AI interfaces. Modern sans-serif typography with slight transparency/overlay effects. Animated data visualization elements. Clean but experimental visual language that feels cutting-edge and approachable.

exampleOutline: Cold Open: Zapier EA's AI Revolution Moment
The Problem: Traditional Productivity Bottlenecks
AI Intern Strategy: Detailed Workflow Breakdown
Real-World Impact and Productivity Metrics
How Viewers Can Implement Similar Strategies

ideas.title: Tokenization takes the lead in the fight for data security
ideas.description: Presented by Capital One SoftwareTokenization is emerging as a cornerstone of modern data security, helping businesses separate the value of their data from its risk. During this VB in Conversation, Ravi Raghu, president, Capital One Software, talks about the ways tokenization can help reduce the value of breached data and preserve underlying data format and usability, including Capital One’s own experience leveraging tokenization at scale. Tokenization, Raghu asserts, is a far superior technolo
hooks: Tokenize Securely: Your 5-Step Data Protection Guide
Hack-Proof Your Data: Tokenization Secrets Revealed
Transform Data Security in 6 Simple Steps

tips: Use screen capture to demonstrate tokenization process
Include live code/terminal demonstrations of tokenization techniques
Create clear chapter markers for each tutorial step

visualDirection.description: High-contrast cybersecurity aesthetic with deep blues and electric greens. Futuristic motion graphics showing data transformation. Clean, technical typography with sharp edges. Animated data flow visualizations. Blend of technical diagrams and modern design elements. Picture-in-picture with instructor overlaid on technical demonstrations.

exampleOutline: Introduction: The Data Security Challenge
What is Tokenization? Core Principles Explained
Step-by-Step Tokenization Implementation Walkthrough
Advanced Techniques and Real-World Applications
Call-to-Action: Implement Your Tokenization Strategy

ideas.title: First Voyage raises $2.5M for its AI companion helps you build habits
ideas.description: First Voyage has raised $2.5 million in a seed funding round from a16z speed run, SignalFire, True Global, and other investors.
hooks: AI Companion Revolution: How First Voyage Raised $2.5M
Habit-Building AI: The Startup Investors Are Betting On
Secrets Behind First Voyage's Million-Dollar Habit Hack

tips: Enable live chat for real-time audience engagement
Prepare pre-screened audience questions to maintain flow
Use multi-camera setup to keep visual energy high during Q&A

visualDirection.description: Bold, dynamic split-screen design with vibrant tech-inspired color palette (electric blues, deep purples). Animated data visualizations showing funding journey. Clean, modern typography with motion-tracked text reveals. Dynamic lower-thirds with investor logos. Picture-in-picture overlay for founder commentary.

exampleOutline: Introduction: First Voyage Funding Story (5 mins)
Funding Landscape Context (10 mins)
AI Companion Technology Deep Dive (15 mins)
Investor Perspective Panel (10 mins)
Live Q&A with Founders (15 mins)

ideas.title: Nvidia reportedly weighs ramping up H200 production to meet surging demand in China
ideas.description: After successfully lobbying the Trump administration to approve the sales of its H200 chips to China, Nvidia is now thinking of adding capacity to produce more of the chips.
hooks: How China's AI Race is Reshaping Global Tech
Nvidia's Secret Weapon in the Chip Wars
Inside the High-Stakes Battle for AI Supremacy

tips: Use archival footage of tech manufacturing and geopolitical tensions
Incorporate dynamic map graphics showing chip trade routes
Include expert interview-style b-roll with tech analysts

visualDirection.description: Geopolitical documentary aesthetic: Cool blue and steel gray color palette, sharp geometric transitions, infographic-style data visualizations, mixed media approach with archival footage, clean sans-serif typography, subtle motion graphics highlighting key statistics, cinematic widescreen composition

exampleOutline: Opening: Dramatic geopolitical context of AI chip competition
Context: US-China technology tensions and semiconductor industry
Deep Dive: Nvidia's H200 chip strategic importance
Global Impact: Economic and technological implications
Closing: Future of international tech innovation

ideas.title: How Zapier’s EA built an army of AI interns to automate meeting prep, strengthen team culture, and scale internal alignment | Cortney Hickey
ideas.description: Watch now | 🎙️ A Zapier EA shows how she automated meeting prep, executive feedback, and cultural reinforcement—turning AI agents into her own team of interns
hooks: AI Interns: How One EA Transformed Zapier's Workflow
Cortney's Secret: Automating Meetings with AI Agents
Zapier's Game-Changing AI Assistant Strategy Revealed

tips: Enable live chat for real-time audience engagement
Prepare pre-submitted Q&A questions to supplement live interaction
Use YouTube's live premiere countdown to build anticipation

visualDirection.description: Bold, tech-forward visual aesthetic with dynamic motion graphics. Futuristic color palette of electric blues and deep purples. Animated AI-inspired visual metaphors. Clean, modern typography with technical overlay graphics. Picture-in-picture with live presenter and AI workflow visualizations.

The Problem: Meeting Prep Inefficiencies at Zapier
